text: Mehboob Ali (born 10 April 1990) is a Pakistani sprinter. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=3|2016 |rowspan=2|South Asian Games |rowspan=2|Guwahati, India |5th |400 m |47.72 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles |52.04 |- |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |46th (h) |400 m |48.37 |- |rowspan=7|2017 |rowspan=2|Islamic Solidarity Games |rowspan=2|Baku, Azerbaijan |4th |400 m hurdles |51.15 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 400 m relay |3:07.62 |- |rowspan=2|Asian Championships |rowspan=2|Bhubaneswar, India |14th (h) |400 m hurdles |52.61 |- |7th |4 × 400 m relay |3:11.42 |- |World Championships |London, United Kingdom |34th (h) |400 m hurdles |52.24 |- |rowspan=2|Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games |rowspan=2|Ashgabat, Turkmenistan |4th (h) |400 m |48.631 |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |4 × 400 m relay |3:11.40 |- |rowspan=2|2018 |rowspan=2|Asian Games |rowspan=2|Jakarta, Indonesia |12th (h) |400 m hurdles |51.27 |- |8th |4 × 400 m relay |3:08.87 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |rowspan=2|Asian Championships |rowspan=2|Doha, Qatar |16th (sf) |400 m |47.61 |- |8th |400 m hurdles |50.94 |} 1Disqualified in the semifinals ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani male sprinters Category:Pakistani male hurdlers Category:Olympic athletes of Pakistan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Pakistan Category:South Asian Games bronze medalists for Pakistan Category:Asian Games competitors for Pakistan Category:South Asian Games medalists in athletics
